title: The Breakdown on Twitter
body: "Smith today on how she would have used the Sovereignty Act - "STRAWS! WE COULD HAVE SAVED THE STRAWS! THINK OF THE ROOT BEER FLOATS!" Apparently we needed this Act so servers could dig out & recycle used plastic straws. That wasn't on our bingo card. #abpoli #ableg #cdnpoli"
readable_content:
The Breakdown (@TheBreakdownAB) (2022-12-10): Smith today on how she would have used the Sovereignty Act - “STRAWS! WE COULD HAVE SAVED THE STRAWS! THINK OF THE ROOT BEER FLOATS!”
Apparently we needed this Act so servers could dig out & recycle used plastic straws.
That wasn’t on our bingo card.
#abpoli #ableg #cdnpoli

- The Breakdown (@TheBreakdownAB) (2022-12-10): Local AB Web Series on AB Politics. Alleged Media Magnate. Not journalists. Locally crowd funded. Content available everywhere you listen to podcasts & YouTube!
summary:
The post seems to be sarcastic and mocking the idea of using the Sovereignty Act to address issues like saving plastic straws for root beer floats. The tone is dismissive and suggests that this specific use of the Act was unexpected and humorous. 

Sentiment: -0.8
